channel.title: Retrieval on Zen LM
channel.description: Recent content in Retrieval on Zen LM

item.title: Zen Reranker: Two-Stage Retrieval Done Right
item.description: Introducing the Zen Reranker, a cross-encoder model that dramatically improves retrieval quality in two-stage pipelines.

item.title: 7680-Dimensional Embeddings: More Dimensions, Better Retrieval
item.description: Why we trained embedding models with 7680 dimensions and what we learned about the relationship between dimensionality and retrieval quality.

item.title: Embedding Spaces at 7680 Dimensions
item.description: Exploring high-dimensional embedding spaces for semantic search and retrieval.
